text: Nocardiopsis arvandica is a bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from sandy soil from the Arvand River in Khoramshahr in Iran.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis arvandica at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2011
title: Nocardiopsis arvandica
